mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_invoice( id,contractId,paymentPlanFact,planInvoiceDate, factIncoiveDate, planPaymentDate,factPaymentDate,companyPayId, companySaleId, payeeName,checkName,billingName, amtWithoutTax,rate,amtOfTax,amt,remaeks,state ) VALUES ( $uuid(),#{contractId},#{paymentPlanFact},#{planInvoiceDate},#{factIncoiveDate},#{planPaymentDate},#{factPaymentDate}, #{companyPayId},#{companySaleId},#{payeeName},#{checkName},#{billingName},#{amtWithoutTax},#{rate}, #{amtOfTax},#{amt},#{remaeks}, #{state} )
